word: During the night the spirit of God has been presenting many things to my mind. The experience that was given us at the General Conference held in Battle Creek early in 1901, was of God. Had Dr. Kellogg at that time done thorough work, the terrible experience through which we are now passing would never have been.--Letter 242, 1903, p. 1. ("Decided Action to Be Taken Now," October, 1903.)
